channel.title: Yell command

item.title: Yell command
item.dc:creator: @HiddenPker HiddenPker
item.description:
@HiddenPker wrote:

Here it is:

} if(command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 8 && donator >= 1) { String text = command.substring(8); yell("[Donator:"+playerName+"]: " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }

This is for deltascape source’s.

Read full topic

item.title: Yell command
item.dc:creator: @code4fun code4fun
item.description:
@code4fun wrote:

[quote=“powerknite7, post:3, topic:280035”]i rrly dint like ur code so i posted my own made its a good one .
goodluck my frend

[code]}
if(command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && muted == false) {
String titles = “”;

if (donator != 1) {
sM(“You need to be a donator to use Yell”);
} else {

switch (playerRights) {
case 0:
titles = "[DONATOR] ";
break;

case 1:
titles = "[MOD] ";
break;

case 2:
titles = "[ADMIN] ";
break;

case 3:
titles = "[OWNER] ";
break;
}
yell(titles + playerName + ": " + command.substring(5));
}
}[/code][/quote]didnt work…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 24, 2009, 12:52:49 am[/size][hr]help!

Read full topic

item.title: Yell command
item.dc:creator: @The_cook_from_runesc The cook from runescape
item.description:
@The_cook_from_runesc wrote:

That code wont work. It only allows donors to yell, not admins, mods or the owner. And you don’t know that int donator is the variable he has set for donor status - if it is he should have known how to write the code anyway.

Read full topic

item.title: Yell command
item.dc:creator: @powerknite7 powerknite7
item.description:
@powerknite7 wrote:

i rrly dint like ur code so i posted my own made its a good one .
goodluck my frend

[code]}
if(command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && muted == false) {
String titles = “”;

if (donator != 1) {
sM(“You need to be a donator to use Yell”);
} else {

switch (playerRights) {
case 0:
titles = "[DONATOR] ";
break;

case 1:
titles = "[MOD] ";
break;

case 2:
titles = "[ADMIN] ";
break;

case 3:
titles = "[OWNER] ";
break;
}
yell(titles + playerName + ": " + command.substring(5));
}
}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Yell command
item.dc:creator: @The_cook_from_runesc The cook from runescape
item.description:
@The_cook_from_runesc wrote:

It depends on what system (if any) you have setup for donors already. Nobody’s just going to write you an entire donor system, you have to be more specific.

Read full topic

item.title: Yell command
item.dc:creator: @code4fun code4fun
item.description:
@code4fun wrote:

how do i change this

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && muted == false) { String text = command.substring(5); yell("["+playerName+"] - " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); } Into a donator only command.
